title: Inside the shadow war between Russia and Ukraine that exploits teens
summary_full: Vika, 18, needed a job. Then an offer came for $2,500 to make a simple delivery that seemed too good to be true. It was a Russian sabotage operation.
summary_public: Vika, 18, needed a job. Then an offer came for $2,500 to make a simple delivery that seemed too good to be true. It was a Russian sabotage operation.

UA.label: negative
UA.evidence: shadow war between Russia and Ukraine
